Jun-24Inventory9,830.8510,525.91695.06Based on the information and explanation provided to us by the management, below are the main reason for material differences in Stock, Debtors and creditors as per Bank Returns submitted based on provisional accounts, and Audited Books of accounts.
1. Delay in receipt of suppliers invoices leading to variation in outstanding balance of Sundry Creditors and advances to suppliers.
2. Difference in stock due to some purchases entered after returns submitted to bank.
3. Difference in Debtors balance is due to some receipt under reconciliation at the time of returns submitted to bank and adjustment done after reconciliation with balance confirmation received from debtors.
4. During the finalisation of Books regrouping were done as per the Schedule III of Company Act,2013.
